::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus drove up to his ship.
"Rodimus Prime, maximize." He transformed to bot mode, and went inside.
He opened his safe, and placed the Maximal Matrix within. He then shut,
and locked it. Without the Matrix, he became Hot Rod again. He decided
to stay, and relax for awile.

::DrillBit::

DrillBit came out of his room, and walked up to the main room. He saw
KitKat return.
"Hey, you ok?" He asked, quite worryed about his beloved.

OOC: I'm leaving today, and wont be back untill Sunday. Thats why
Rodimus went to his ship. I'm going to keep RPing with DrillBit untill I
have to leave. Normally Yanshosh gets my charrs, but since he is away, I
have to do something.
